epics.title: Welcome and Onboarding Experience
epics.description: Develop a guided onboarding experience to improve user activation rates and feature discovery.

stories.title: Implement Welcome Screen
stories.description: Create a welcome screen that appears after email verification with personalized greeting and options.
acceptance_criteria: Welcome screen appears after email verification
Personalized greeting uses user's name
Product value proposition displayed in 3-4 bullet points
"Get Started" CTA button is present
Option to skip onboarding is available

agent_context.goal: Enhance user engagement by providing a personalized welcome experience.

stories.title: Develop User Type Selection
stories.description: Enable users to select their user type for personalized onboarding.
acceptance_criteria: User can select from Individual, Team Lead, or Enterprise Admin
Selection is stored in user profile for future personalization

agent_context.goal: Tailor the onboarding experience based on user type to improve relevance.
self_check: Is the selection stored correctly in the user profile?
Does the UI update based on the selected user type?

stories.title: Implement Goal Setting Feature
stories.description: Present relevant goals based on user type and allow users to select at least one.
acceptance_criteria: Goals presented are relevant to user type
User can select multiple goals
At least one goal selection is required

agent_context.goal: Guide users to set relevant goals to enhance their onboarding experience.
self_check: Are the goals relevant to the user type?
Is at least one goal required before proceeding?

stories.title: Profile Completion Form
stories.description: Collect essential profile information including display name, profile photo, timezone, and notification preferences.
acceptance_criteria: Display name is required and between 2-50 characters
Profile photo is optional, max 5MB, jpg/png only
Timezone is auto-detected but can be overridden by user
User can set notification preferences

agent_context.goal: Ensure users provide necessary profile information for a personalized experience.
self_check: Is the display name validation correct?
Can users override the auto-detected timezone?

stories.title: Create Interactive Tutorial
stories.description: Provide a 5-step interactive tutorial post-profile setup to guide users through key features.
acceptance_criteria: Tutorial includes steps: create project, add task, set due date, invite collaborator, complete task
Each step has highlighted UI element with tooltip
"Next" and "Skip" buttons are available
Progress indicator shows current step out of 5

agent_context.goal: Help users discover key features through an interactive guide.
self_check: Does the tutorial adapt based on user type?

stories.title: Implement Completion Celebration
stories.description: Celebrate onboarding completion with a confetti animation, success message, quick links, and help center link.
acceptance_criteria: Confetti animation is shown
"You're all set!" message is displayed
Quick links to common actions are provided
Link to help center is available

agent_context.goal: Provide a positive reinforcement to users completing the onboarding process.
self_check: Is the animation smooth and non-intrusive?
Are the quick links relevant and functional?
